AD_Distillery_Blackboard1_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Distillery_Blackboard1_0.text: *Waning Moon Distillery - No last call until the casks are dry.*

AD_Distillery_Blackboard2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Distillery_Blackboard2_0.text: *Welcome to The Waning Moon - to lifelong friends, both old and new.*

AD_Distillery_Blackboard4_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Distillery_Blackboard4_0.text: *Straight from field to plate - eat local, and support your community.*
